name:
Empowering Privacy - 
Enabling Private Authentication for the Masses
description:
Description:
Discover the next evolution in identity authentication at our Anon Aadhaar Workshop. Join us to learn about zero-knowledge proofs that enable private yet verifiable identity verification by leveraging government documents like Indian's Aadhaar ID card program.

Highlights:

- Understand Anon Aadhaar's role in privacy-focused authentication.
- Dive into zero-knowledge proofs for secure data verification.
- Hands-on: Integrate proofs using the Anon Aadhaar SDK.
- Watch a live app demo showcasing private authentication.
- Hear about future plans and possibilities of expanding this scheme to future countries.

Who Should Attend:
Developers, privacy advocates, and anyone curious about advanced identity protection.

Format:
Interactive session with theory, hands-on SDK experience, live demo, and Q&A.

Key Takeaway:
You'll grasp how Anon Aadhaar reshapes identity verification and can implement private authentication in your projects.
